TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DirectoryPropertyAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class DirectoryPropertyAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class DirectoryPropertyAttribute sealed : Attribute

Docs.summary: Contains the data required by the store to map a principal property to a directory attribute. This attribute is required for principal extensions and can only be set on a property. It must be specified on every property that represents a directory attribute in the extended class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If multiple directory attributes are used in the extension methods, multiple attributes should be added to the property (one per attribute).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string schemaAttributeName) cil managed

Docs.param: The name of the attribute that is set in the directory. The property is initialized to this value. This property represents the ldapDisplayName for application directory and domain directories.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the schema attribute name.

Docs.value: A enumeration value that specifies the type of store to which this attribute applies, or null if no context is set.
